EmailTemplate.subject: Join our La Prairie pampering session at the Heeren
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}}, Perrier-Jouët invites you to join us at an exclusive La Prairie pampering session this March. Discover the iconic Skin Caviar Collection and learn the latest beauty secrets from La Prarie’s own skin care experts. Be one of the first to experience La Prairie’s latest gilded pleasure - Cellular Radiance Perfecting Fluide Pure Gold. We will treat you to a Perrier-Jouët Champagne tasting and you’ll be walking home with a complimentary La Prairie gift worth more than $100. We have limited seats for this exclusive event so secure your attendance today and choose your preferred time slot on March 11th 2016. Session 1: 3PM – 5PM
Session 2: 7PM – 9PM We look forward to welcome you at the the Heeren on Orchard Road for some exclusive pampering. Your Sincerely,
Perrier-Jouët Singapore <[[https://www.google.com.sg/maps/place/The+Heeren/@1.3025948,103.8352472,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x31da199169636bb7:0x5404323300ccead7]]> Venue: Robinsons The Heeren, Personal Shoppers’ Room (Level 3) 260 Orchard Road Singapore 238855 Programme:
